/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape below. The street, teeming with life, stretches out ahead, flanked by towering buildings that reach up towards the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, emphasizing the vastness of the city and the constant movement of its inhabitants.
